publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1580 Mr Stewart Maxwell: More Powers for Scotland-That the Parliament welcomes the findings of the State of the Nation 2004 survey, carried out by the Joseph Rowntree Reform Trust, which found that 66% of people living in Scotland wanted the Parliament to have more powers; recognises that only by having these powers can the Parliament and the country truly begin to fulfil their enormous potential, and urges all members to follow the public mood and campaign for all the normal powers of a sovereign nation to be transferred from Westminster to Holyrood forthwith.

S2M-1580 More Powers for Scotland (lodged on 13 July 2004) Christine Grahame*, Jim Mather*, Bruce Crawford*, Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Carolyn Leckie*, Frances Curran*, Tommy Sheridan*, Patrick Harvie*, Stewart Stevenson*, Brian Adam*
S2M-1580 More Powers for Scotland (lodged on 13 July 2004) Rosie Kane*, Richard Lochhead*, Rob Gibson*
S2M-1580 More Powers for Scotland (lodged on 13 July 2004) Ms Sandra White*
S2M-1580 More Powers for Scotland (lodged on 13 July 2004) Linda Fabiani*
S2M-1580 More Powers for Scotland (lodged on 13 July 2004) Alex Neil*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*
S2M-1580 More Powers for Scotland (lodged on 13 July 2004) Mr Bruce McFee*
S2M-1580 More Powers for Scotland (lodged on 13 July 2004) Mr Adam Ingram*
